sense.gloss: to fit into (a box, frame, category, etc.), to be contained within, to fall within (e.g. a budget)
to settle down (into), to be installed (in one's rightful place), to be returned (to one's original position)
to settle into (one's position), to take up (a post), to occupy (a role)
to be delivered, to be paid (e.g. taxes)
to be settled (dispute, conflict, etc.), to be sorted, to subside (e.g. wind), to calm down, to abate
to be satisfied (e.g. with an answer), to consent, to agree

sdata.j: ↑奮闘↑↓ふんとう↓が|おさまる|と、↑話↑↓はな↓し↑合↑↓あ↓いが↑再↑↓ふたた↓び↑始↑↓はじ↓まった。
sdata.e: When the excitement died down, the discussion resumed.

sdata.j: この↑薬↑↓くすり↓で↑頭痛↑↓ずつう↓は|おさまる|でしょう。
sdata.e: This medicine will soothe your headache.

sdata.j: この↑事↑↓こと↓にかっかするなよ。そのうちに|おさまる|から。
sdata.e: Don't be so worked up over this thing. It will all blow over before you know it.

sdata.j: ↑結局↑↓けっきょく↓うまく|おさまる|だろう。
sdata.e: It'll come all right in the end.

sdata.j: ↑最後↑↓さいご↓にはうまく↑収↑↓|おさ↓まる|だろう。
sdata.e: It'll come right in the end.

sdata.j: ↑怒↑↓いか↓りっぽい↑人↑↓ひと↓は１０まで↑数↑↓かぞ↓えるようにすべきだ。そうすれば↑油↑↓あぶら↓が↑風波↑↓ふうは↓をしずめるように、むしゃくしゃした↑気持↑↓きも↓ちは|おさまる|。
sdata.e: A man who angers easily should learn to count to ten - it calms trouble like pouring oil on troubled waters.

sdata.j: ↑風↑↓かぜ↓が|おさまる|と↑急↑↓きゅう↓に↑静↑↓しず↓かになった。
sdata.e: There was a sudden calm as the wind dropped.

sdata.j: ↑腫↑↓は↓れが↑治↑↓|おさ↓まる|まで、どれぐらいかかりそうですか？
sdata.e: How many days will it take until the swelling goes down?

sdata.j: ↑雪↑↓ゆき↓が|おさまる|まで、ここにいるのがいいんじゃないかな。
sdata.e: I think it's better to stay here until the snow stops.

sdata.j: ↑最後↑↓さいご↓には↑全↑↓すべ↓てがうまく↑収↑↓|おさ↓まる|といいんだけど。
sdata.e: I hope everything will turn out well in the end.
